snippet.title: John Gray on His Book, 'Why Mars and Venus Collide'
snippet.description: John Gray describes the epidemic of stress plaguing us today -- and what men and women can do to...couple in America, says best-selling author John Gray (Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus).
